wmndsButtonProps.name: classNames
wmndsButtonProps.description: List of aditional classes which will be added to the button. Usually not related with the button component itself. A margin definition could be an example use case.

wmndsButtonProps.name: iconLeft
wmndsButtonProps.description: Name of the left icon, which will be used to import icon and place it on the left side of the button, before text.

wmndsButtonProps.name: iconRight
wmndsButtonProps.description: Name of the right icon, which will be used to import icon and place it on the right side of the button, after text.

wmndsButtonProps.name: isActive
wmndsButtonProps.description: It true, button will assume active state. Defaults to false.

wmndsButtonProps.name: isDarkBg
wmndsButtonProps.description: It true, button colours will adjust to work over a dark background. Defaults to false.

wmndsButtonProps.name: isDisabled
wmndsButtonProps.description: It true, button will assume disabled state. Defaults to false.

wmndsButtonProps.name: isLoading
wmndsButtonProps.description: It true, button will assume a loading state and will show a spinner. Defaults to false.

wmndsButtonProps.name: role
wmndsButtonProps.description: Button role by default is button. Other valid values are: submit and reset.

wmndsButtonProps.name: text
wmndsButtonProps.description: Required. The text displayed inside of each button.

wmndsButtonProps.name: type
wmndsButtonProps.description: Type of the button. As default it is null. Available types: link, primary, secondary, destructive, start, mode
